sentences.en: But they rested on the Sabbath in obedience to the commandment.
sentences.cn: 她们在安息日,便遵着诫命安息了.

sentences.en: Cantonese Chinese Sabbath School begins at 11:00 am in the Social Hall.
sentences.cn: 粤语(广东话)安息日学上午11:00开始在联谊厅举行.

sentences.en: Capital offenses ranged from gathering sticks on the Sabbath.
sentences.cn: 死罪包括在安息日检柴禾.

sentences.en: English Sabbath School begins at 9:30 am in the Chapel.
sentences.cn: 英语安息日学:上午9:30开始在副堂举行.

sentences.en: Few persons observe the Sabbath in the manner of the early Puritans.
sentences.cn: 很少有人按早期清教徒的方式守安息日.

sentences.en: From that time on they did not come on the Sabbath.
sentences.cn: 从此以后,他们在安息日就不来了.

sentences.en: He saw a busy Saturday ushered out , the Sabbath in, and nothing done.
sentences.cn: 眼看着忙忙碌碌的星期六过去了,又迎来了礼拜天, 还是一事无成.

sentences.en: Holier than these days is the Sabbath, which is demarcated by even further rules and observances.
sentences.cn: 比这些日子更神圣的，是安息日，它被更加严格的规则和规定区分开来。

sentences.en: It was considered a sin to work or play on the Sabbath.
sentences.cn: 在安息日工作或消遣都被视为罪过.

sentences.en: Keep in memory the Sabbath and let it be a holy day.
sentences.cn: 当记念安息日,守为圣日.

sentences.en: Remember the Sabbath day, to keep it holy.
So come and be healed on those days, not on the Sabbath.
sentences.cn: 那六日之内,可以来求医, 在安息日却不可.

sentences.en: The people in this district keep the Sabbath.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的人遵守安息日.

sentences.en: There was no Sabbath - school during day - school vacation, but everybody was early at church.
sentences.cn: 走读学校放假,主日学校也不上课, 可是去教堂的人却很早就到了.

sentences.en: They pulled down the shades and broke the Sabbath.
sentences.cn: 他们放下窗帘,不守安息日的规矩了.

sentences.en: When does Sabbath begin on the moon, where the sun sets once a month?
sentences.cn: 在一个月日落一次的时候,什么时候才是由月亮开始的安息日?

sentences.en: Would you pull an ass out of a pit on the sabbath?
sentences.cn: 你们中间谁有驴或牛在安息日掉在井里不立时拉它上 呢 ?

sentences.en: You might not even be able to come to church on Sabbath morning.
sentences.cn: 或许你们也没法在安息日的早晨来教堂做礼拜。

trans.tran_en: to obey or not obey the religious rules of the Sabbath
